cards.name: Beacon of Immortality
cards.text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

cards.name: Day of Judgment
cards.text: Destroy all creatures.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Shielded by Faith
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has indestructible.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.

cards.name: Veteran's Reflexes
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
cards.flavor: "Assume everything wants to kill you. At the very least, assume everything wants what's in your pack."

cards.name: Vow of Duty
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
cards.flavor:
"I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."
-Kaalia of the Vast

cards.name: Aether Gale
cards.text: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.

cards.name: Blatant Thievery
cards.text: For each opponent, gain control of target permanent that player controls.
cards.flavor: Centuries of association with the Sun Empire have taught the dinosaurs that shiny things are important.

cards.name: Concentrate
cards.text: Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

cards.name: Merfolk Sovereign
cards.text:
Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: "We are not an empire, and I am not a queen. But I speak with the shout of the rivers and the whisper of the clinging mist."

cards.name: Threads of Disloyalty
cards.text:
Enchant creature with mana value 2 or less
You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"Over time, Konda grew ever more suspicious, fearing even his most loyal allies were being manipulated by unseen hands."
-The History of Kamigawa

cards.name: Time Warp
cards.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
cards.flavor: Just when you thought you'd survived the first wave.

cards.name: Unsummon
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Not to be. That is the answer.

cards.name: Vow of Flight
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
cards.flavor:
"Soaring is wasted on the winged."
-Edric, Spymaster of Trest

cards.name: Bloodbond Vampire
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.
cards.flavor:
"Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."
-General Tazri, allied commander

cards.name: Child of Night
cards.text: Lifelink
cards.flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

cards.name: Coat with Venom
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor:
"Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."
-Xathi the Infallible

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavor: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

cards.name: Innocent Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

cards.name: Necropolis Regent
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor: "Jarad fancies himself king of the undercity, but he's merely king of rot."

cards.name: Urge to Feed
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

cards.name: Vampire Interloper
cards.text:
Flying
Vampire Interloper can't block.
cards.flavor: He listens to every heartbeat, deciding which one of hundreds he will stop.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

cards.name: Vampire Noble
cards.flavor:
"No emergency is so dire that it cannot be dealt with elegantly."
-Olivia Voldaren

cards.name: Aggravated Assault
cards.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Disaster Radius
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

cards.name: Mass Mutiny
cards.text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "You too, Squib?"

cards.name: Rush of Adrenaline
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Scarecrows only go so far in sending the message to stay away.

cards.name: Shared Animosity
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.
cards.flavor:
"It is the nature of souls that they burn more brightly together than apart."
-Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

cards.name: Vow of Lightning
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
cards.flavor:
"Ruhan would never agree to such terms."
-Ruhan of the Fomori

cards.name: Borderland Ranger
cards.text: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Hunter's Prowess
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."
cards.flavor: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

cards.name: Prey Upon
cards.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: Nature exists in balance: river and jungle, sky and sea, predator and prey.

cards.name: Rancor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Soul of the Harvest
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.

cards.name: Vow of Wildness
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
cards.flavor:
"Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath-or wishes it could."
-Karador, Ghost Chieftain

cards.name: Jungle Barrier
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Within silent clearings guarded by living palisades, the natural world guards its most precious secrets.

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

cards.name: Mortify
cards.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

cards.name: Zealous Persecution
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
cards.flavor: "Rejoice! Your vile blood will help fulfill our righteous cause."

cards.name: Adaptive Automaton
cards.text:
As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

cards.name: Prismatic Lens
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: It bends not light but mana, aligning its chaotic currents into the sharp angles necessary for the mystic's purposes.

cards.name: Quicksilver Amulet
cards.text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Those who examine the amulet too closely have been known to become part of its ornate carvings.

cards.name: Crumbling Necropolis
cards.text:
Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
cards.flavor: It's said the spirits of the drowned dead hang their lights from the shattered figureheads.

cards.name: Jungle Shrine
cards.text:
Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.
cards.flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects: the creative sun, the sustaining sun, and the destructive sun.

cards.name: Tainted Field
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
